name: flow-list
author: Ondřej Vít
description: A personal journal app to log three positive moments each day, with search, tags, and reminders. Built using Next.js and NestJS.

scripts.lint:all: pnpm --parallel --filter frontend run lint && pnpm --parallel --filter backend run lint
scripts.prepare:pre-commit:
echo 'echo "Running pre-commit hook..."
pnpm run lint:all' > .husky/pre-commit && chmod +x .husky/pre-commit
